issue.title: [C++] Refactor Abseil build in ThirdpartyToolchain
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14157](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14157). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Both google-cloud-cpp and gRPC depend on Abseil.  We need to refactor the Abseil build to its own macro so it can be more easily reused.
